channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Patagonia CEO: The EPA is ‘endangering’ America’s businesses on climate
item.description: Instead of delivering on environmental protection, the head of the EPA is talking about gas prices.

item.title: Figma’s CEO is now worth $5 billion after IPO—like Mark Zuckerberg, he dropped out of college to build a tech empire instead of sitting in class
item.description: As Gen Z questions the value of higher education, Figma CEO Dylan Field is the latest tech billionaire to make it big without a college degree.

item.title: “Decarbonization is not just a climate plan, it is an economic strategy.” Why European competitiveness hinges on homegrown power
item.description: Can political commitment, leadership capability, and business involvement power Europe's future and boost its global competitiveness? In the remaining...

item.title: As Europe pushes towards its €1.5 trillion renewables target, companies like Ikea look for green power opportunities today
item.description: Companies like Ikea and Stegra illustrate how European businesses are increasingly viewing the transition as an opportunity in itself, rather than sim...

item.title: What can Northvolt’s failure teach us about Europe’s competitive future?
item.description: How a company founded by two former Tesla executives managed to fail despite such a massive amount of capital will be a case study for business school...

item.title: Trump narrows Fed chair list: Here's who's out and who's rising
